backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing principals and text values in sets with add and query functions for persistent, remote, and external entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a deployment feature to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their functionality for Tambola features and voice controls.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide with prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with viewport-fit support and favicon setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout orchestrating game state, voice settings, announcements, and UI panels.
frontend/src/features/tambola/components: UI controls for drawing numbers, quick reset, and auto‑draw settings with confirmation dialog.
Panel showing called numbers in reverse order with color‑coded recent entries.
Dialog for recording, previewing, and deleting host voice clips for numbers 1‑90.
Card component showing the most recently drawn number or completion message.
Provides a button that opens a confirmation dialog and triggers a new game callback.
Displays numbers 1–90 in a grid, highlighting those that have been called.
Allows users to enter numbers and verifies them against the called numbers list with validation and alerts.
UI panel for toggling voice announcements, adjusting reading mode, selecting voice priority, and opening voice manager.
frontend/src/features/tambola/storage.ts: Handles loading, saving, and creating initial tambola game and auto-draw settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/tambola/types.ts: Defines Tambola game state, auto-draw settings, persisted state, and game action types.
frontend/src/features/tambola/useTambola: Custom hook managing game state, drawing logic, undo, reset, new game, auto-draw settings, and persistence.
frontend/src/features/tambola/verify/par: Parses user input into unique valid numbers between 1–90, ignoring invalid tokens.
Utilities for loading browser TTS voices, selecting the best voice, checking availability, and speaking text.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/type: Defines types for reading modes, voice priority, voice settings, and playback steps.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useH: Hook for recording microphone audio clips for number announcements and saving them.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useV: Builds and plays a sequence of voice steps for a number using recordings or TTS with fallback handling.
Manages voice settings state and persists changes to storage.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/voic: Provides audio context management and helpers for playing and stopping Blob-based audio.
Stores, loads, lists, and deletes recorded number clips in IndexedDB.
Loads and saves voice settings to localStorage with defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, state, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and global layout and background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests.
